pageContext.quote: How much better to heal than seek revenge from injury. Vengeance wastes alot of time and exposes you to many more injuries than the first thatsparked it. Anger always outlasts hurt. Best to take the opposite course.Would anyone think it normal to return a kick to a mule or a bite to a dog?
pageContext.platform: On Anger, 3.27.2 via The Daily Stoic
